content.story: Last weekend, I visited my grandparents who live in a small village near the mountains. They have a beautiful garden where they grow vegetables and fruits. My grandmother made apple pie using apples from their garden. It was delicious! During the day, my grandfather showed me how to plant tomatoes. We dug holes in the soil and placed small plants inside. Then we watered them carefully. In the evening, we sat outside and watched the stars. My grandfather knows the names of many stars and constellations. He taught me how to find the North Star. I had a wonderful time with them and didn't want to leave on Sunday.

questions.question: Where do the writer's grandparents live?
options: In a small village near the mountains
questions.explanation: The story says 'I visited my grandparents who live in a small village near the mountains.'

questions.question: What did the grandmother make?
questions.explanation: The story says 'My grandmother made apple pie using apples from their garden.'

questions.question: What did the grandfather teach the writer?
options: How to find the North Star
questions.explanation: The story says 'He taught me how to find the North Star.'

content.summary: A story about someone visiting their grandparents in the countryside, helping in the garden, and learning about stars.

content.story: Maria started a new job last month. She works as a receptionist in a busy hotel in the city center. Every day, she helps guests check in and check out. She gives them information about local restaurants and tourist attractions. Maria speaks three languages: English, Spanish, and French. This is very useful because many international tourists stay at the hotel. Her working hours are from 2 PM to 10 PM. She prefers working in the afternoon and evening because she can sleep late in the morning. Sometimes the job is stressful when there are too many guests waiting, but Maria enjoys meeting people from different countries. Next year, she wants to become a hotel manager.

questions.question: What is Maria's job?
questions.explanation: The story says 'She works as a receptionist in a busy hotel in the city center.'

questions.question: How many languages does Maria speak?
questions.explanation: The story says 'Maria speaks three languages: English, Spanish, and French.'

questions.question: What are Maria's working hours?
questions.explanation: The story says 'Her working hours are from 2 PM to 10 PM.'

content.summary: A story about Maria who works as a multilingual receptionist at a city center hotel and aspires to become a hotel manager.

content.story: Daniel wanted to buy a birthday present for his sister. He went to the shopping mall on Saturday morning. First, he looked in a clothes shop. He saw a nice scarf, but it was too expensive. Then he went to a bookshop because his sister loves reading. He found a novel by her favorite author. It wasn't expensive, so he decided to buy it. At the checkout, the shop assistant wrapped the book in colorful paper. Daniel also bought a birthday card. When he got home, he wrote a message in the card. He gave the present to his sister on Sunday. She was very happy and started reading the book immediately.

questions.question: Why didn't Daniel buy the scarf?
questions.explanation: The story says 'He saw a nice scarf, but it was too expensive.'

questions.question: Why did Daniel choose to look in a bookshop?
options: It was close to the clothes shop
questions.explanation: The story says 'Then he went to a bookshop because his sister loves reading.'

questions.question: What did Daniel's sister do when she received the book?
questions.explanation: The story says 'She was very happy and started reading the book immediately.'

content.summary: A story about Daniel shopping for a birthday present for his sister and choosing a book by her favorite author.

content.story: Last summer, I went camping with my friends. We drove to a beautiful national park that is famous for its lakes and forests. When we arrived, we put up our tents near a lake. It was a hot day, so we decided to go swimming. The water was cold but refreshing. In the evening, we made a campfire and cooked sausages. We also toasted marshmallows. Later, we told ghost stories. I couldn't sleep well that night because I was scared! The next morning, we went hiking in the forest. We saw many animals, including deer and rabbits. We took lots of photos. It was a great weekend, although I was very tired when I got home on Sunday night.

questions.question: Where did they camp?
questions.explanation: The story says 'When we arrived, we put up our tents near a lake.'

questions.question: Why couldn't the writer sleep well?
options: They were scared after the ghost stories
questions.explanation: The story says 'I couldn't sleep well that night because I was scared!' after mentioning ghost stories.

questions.question: Which animals did they see in the forest?
questions.explanation: The story says 'We saw many animals, including deer and rabbits.'

content.summary: A story about a camping trip in a national park, including swimming, campfire activities, and a forest hike.

content.story: My flight to Paris was delayed by two hours. I had to wait at the airport, which was very boring. When we finally boarded the plane, I found my seat next to the window. A young woman sat next to me. She looked nervous and told me that this was her first flight. I tried to reassure her that flying is safe. During takeoff, she closed her eyes and held my hand tightly. I was surprised but didn't mind. After we reached cruising altitude, she relaxed and apologized. We started talking and discovered that we were both going to Paris for a language course. We decided to meet for coffee after the course on Monday. Sometimes, flight delays can lead to new friendships!

questions.question: How long was the flight delayed?
questions.explanation: The story says 'My flight to Paris was delayed by two hours.'

questions.question: Why was the woman nervous?
questions.explanation: The story says 'She looked nervous and told me that this was her first flight.'

questions.question: What did the writer and the woman decide to do in Paris?
questions.explanation: The story says 'We decided to meet for coffee after the course on Monday.'

content.summary: A story about a delayed flight to Paris where the narrator meets a nervous first-time flyer, and they discover they're both attending the same language course.
